topic.title: US Uniformed Services Person - conformance rules

section.p: This class represents information about a person while in the role of a member of the United States Uniformed Services, which includes military and Public Health Service members.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] grade with data type Code
A military, naval, or civil service rank

Contains exactly one [1..1] rank with data type Code
An official position or grade; e.g., the rank of sergeant.

Contains exactly one [1..1] grade with data type Code
A military, naval, or civil service rank

Contains exactly one [1..1] rank with data type Code
An official position or grade; e.g., the rank of sergeant.
